title: (x) Please ID both fonts / serif and sans - Liberation Serif Bold, (similar to) Frutiger {Jan, Greg Shutters}
content:
I have had great success with the first 2. Can someone ID this font? I think the same font was used on both lines but I could be wrong. Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016035739im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logowhite_3767.gif)
author: rauscher3

comments.content: I'm tempted to say that the bottom one is Frutiger, but it's hard to tell at that size. The serif one looks like Lucida Bright Bold but the dot on the /i/ is square, not rounded.

[Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016035739/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 "Frequently Asked Question – What do I enter in the “Title” line?")
